Who is Celtson?

I am an extremely happy and energetic individual, always trying to find the fun - and sometimes sarcasm - in a situation. I love to smile and laugh and have a good time. I absolutely love people and interacting with them and have a passion for numerous activities, including web delopment and design.

More About Me

I've been living in The United States for about 5 years now. During those 5 years, UX development has slowly but strongly crept up as one of my top passions in life. I work at LifeWay Christian Resources located downtown of the music city Nashville. Love my job and love the people I work with.

Entangled with my passion for design and code lies a few other passions. I crave music and the beauty of it – which is why I am in Nashville – and take advantage of any opportunity I encounter to better myself.

Sports and I have been best buddies for quite some time now. Gives me a hard time with injuries once in a while, but my love for it will never die.

Yes, I am from the Bahamas :)
I absolutely LOVE music!
Not the best at golf, but sports are my go to.

"Living for love & acceptance is living in slavery; living from love & acceptance is living in freedom."

- Pete Wilson
